item.title: HowTo Add Piwik Tracking to Ghost
item.description: This is what about piwik on wiki. goto Step 1 - Getting your Piwik Tracking code The first step to having Piwik tracking your Ghost blog will be to add a new website in Piwik, if you are unfamiliar with this process you can checkout the Piwik documention on Managing Websites.

item.title: HowTo Install piwik with nginx on centos 6.x
item.description: This is my nginx config. server { listen blog.ultraera.org:80; server_name blog.
